channel.title: private information retrieval | Chalmers Security & Privacy Lab

item.title: FrodoPIR: Simple, Scalable, Single-Server Private Information Retrieval
item.description: SofÃ­a Celi is a cryptography researcher at Brave. She is the co-chair of the human rights and protocols considerations working group at IRTF, of the Post-Quantum Use In Protocols working group at IETF, and of the anti-fraud community group at W3C. She studied classical music and literature, but currently researches about security, cryptography and privacy on the Internet.
